comment.text: Probable transporter. The nucleotide-binding fold acts as an ATP-binding subunit with ATPase activity.
Can form homodimers and heterodimers with ABCD2/ALDR and ABCD3/PMP70. Dimerization is necessary to form an active transporter. Interacts with PEX19.

disease.name: Adrenoleukodystrophy
disease.description: A peroxisomal metabolic disorder characterized by progressive multifocal demyelination of the central nervous system and by peripheral adrenal insufficiency (Addison disease). It results in mental deterioration, corticospinal tract dysfunction, and cortical blindness. Different clinical manifestations exist like: cerebral childhood ALD (CALD), adult cerebral ALD (ACALD), adrenomyeloneuropathy (AMN) and 'Addison disease only' (ADO) phenotype.

comment.text: The disease is caused by mutations affecting the gene represented in this entry.
The promoter region of ABCD1 is deleted in the chromosome Xq28 deletion syndrome which involves ABCD1 and the neighboring gene BCAP31.
Belongs to the ABC transporter superfamily. ABCD family. Peroxisomal fatty acyl CoA transporter (TC 3.A.1.203) subfamily.

comment.name: ABCMdb
comment.text: Database for mutations in ABC proteins

property.value: Beta-oxidation of very long chain fatty acids
F:ATPase activity, coupled to transmembrane movement of substances
P:fatty acid beta-oxidation using acyl-CoA oxidase
P:very long-chain fatty acid catabolic process

feature.description: Very rare polymorphism; does not affect ALDP function; dbSNP:rs183021839.
In ALD; CALD, AMN and AD-types.
In ALD; does not affect protein stability, homo- and heterodimerization with ALDR and PMP70.
In ALD; ALD and AMN-types; does not affect protein stability, homo- and heterodimerization with ALDR and PMP70; dbSNP:rs128624219.
In ALD; CALD, AMN and ADO-types; significantly decreases homodimerization and abolishes heterodimerization with ALDR and PMP70; dbSNP:rs128624214.
In ALD; CALD and AS-types; reduced ATPase activity.
In ALD; AMN-type; significantly decreases homodimerization and abolishes heterodimerization with ALDR and PMP70.
In ALD; decreased ATP-binding affinity; dbSNP:rs128624225.
In ALD; CALD, AMN and ALMD-types; dbSNP:rs201774661.
In ALD; ALD-type and asymptomatic; dbSNP:rs4010613.
In ALD; ADO and AMN-types with cerebral involvement.
In ALD; CALD, ALMD and AS-types.
